alert.note: Alert for Coleman; Concho; McCulloch (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 8:24PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Coleman, northwestern McCulloch and eastern Concho Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 822 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 765, or near Eden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eden, Gouldbusk, Stacy, Waldrip, Salt Gap, Lohn, Pear Valley, Doole, Millersview, The Intersection Of Us- 87 And Ranch Road 2134, The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 765 and Fife. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
